reference.title: Creating a high-availability deployment without internet access

section.p: The procedures in this chapter create a high-availability deployment of and on Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) 7.1 or 7.2 hosts, or on CentOS 7.1 or 7.2 hosts. To use the procedures in this chapter, you must have a minimum of four hosts. None of the hosts require internet access.
For more information about deploying and , refer to the .
section.note: For optimal results, review this chapter thoroughly before starting the installation process.
